ygData.msgSnippet: haha...i was thinking the exact same thing =) a black/red blend down the armplates would certainly be original and best of all unique...something i d love to
ygData.messageBody:
haha...i was thinking the exact same thing =)

a black/red blend down the armplates would certainly be original and best of
all unique...something i'd love to see even though i don't really care for
the black/red color combination.

kg
